admission: The admission process involves an online application followed by an interview.
All year long, admissions are available. For deadlines, visit our website.
library: The library is open Monday to Friday from 8 AM to 10 PM.
You can find digital resources on the library's website 24/7.
courses: We offer a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate courses.
You can explore all available courses on our university website.
fees: Tuition fees depend on the course you choose. Check the fees section on our website.
Scholarships are available for eligible students. Contact the finance office for details.
campus: Our campus features modern facilities and beautiful green spaces.
You can take a virtual tour of the campus on our website.
events: The university hosts career fairs and cultural events throughout the year.
Upcoming events are listed on the university calendar online.
hostel: We have on-campus hostels with comfortable accommodation for students.
Hostel applications can be made after securing admission.
transport: The university provides a free shuttle service for students.
Public transport routes to the campus are detailed on our website.
sports: The university has excellent sports facilities, including a gym and swimming pool.
Join one of our many sports clubs to stay active and meet new friends!
